This is where you find..

True Happiness

"Make yourself happy and you will be happy for a day. Teach yourself how to be happy and you will be happy for a life time."

<<<<<<< HEAD

Our goal is to turn you into a

"Happiness Expert."

Approach

We do not claim what is right. What we offer is the path. Only by walking the path will you find out for yourself if True Happiness can actually improve your happiness. What we want is simply to let the practice speaks for itself.

What You Will Receive From True Happiness

Happiness

What we will learn is not just a textbook kind of happiness but one that you will be able to experience and apply to your daily life.

Truth

At True Happiness, the approach to find True Happiness is through truth and science.

Purpose

Why not do what matters most?

World Peace

World peace depends on how humanity seeks and defines happiness. If happiness is to "take" rather than to "give" then there is no way humanity will find world peace. Thus, happiness can and must be developed.

Putting Our Lives On The Line..

True Happiness is not out to get. It is out to give. And we are out to give everyone the best thing in life with nothing in return. We are willing to put our lives on the line for all this because we know that if your practice enough and you practice correctly it will work. True Happiness will be at your door without even needing to want it. So what are you waiting for...

Let's Get Started!
